title: South.Park.S02.WITH.INTROS.720p.WEBRip.H.264
description:
So, I was thrilled to see that Phr0sty and SiCKBEARD uploaded the 720p remasters of Season 2. However, I really liked the intros that Season 1 and 2 had, so I decided to create my own version of that using the DVDRs.

The DVDRs and the WEBRips are actually 29.970 fps, so deinterlaced the DVDRs instead of detelecining them.

I obviously had to reencode the video for Episodes 1-12, this was done @ CRF 19 and it looks fine in my opinion. I also had to reencode the audio, I did this for all episodes because HC-AAC isn't recognised by some players - this was done with libfkd_aac at vbr 5 so there shouldn't be any noticable quality loss.

Episode 13-18 have the only original video files
